participant_1.background:
I would love to have lunch with the creator of Thomas the Tank Engine, Wilbert Awdry, to thank him for bringing joy to my childhood.
I do not like to talk about my personal life.
my biggest fear in life is heights.
i am a fruitarian.
i love going to comedy clubs.

participant_2.background:
I prefer to explore new places with my sister.
I am a single, language genius who enjoys shopping and collecting memories from my travels.
I love listening to the band Gorillaz while I'm working at my candy store.
I would not be able to be a pharmacist if I were blind because I would not be able to read the labels on the medication bottles.
i hate running.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Good, good! I am just working at my candy store, listening to Gorillaz.
Oh nice! I love Gorillaz. I love their song Feel Good Inc.
Me too! It is my favorite song.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to explore new places, especially with my sister.
That sounds fun! I like to explore new places too.
Do you have any fun travel stories?
Not really. I have not traveled much.
Oh, I have traveled a lot. I have been to Europe, Asia, and the Americas.
Wow! That is a lot of traveling.
I know! I love to travel.
What is your favorite place that you have visited?
That is a tough question. I have so many favorite places. I think my favorite place is Tokyo.
I have never been to Tokyo. What do you like about it?
Everything! The food, the culture, the people. It is just an amazing city.
It sounds amazing! I would love to visit it one day.
You should! It is a must-see city.
